name: Browser History Cleaner
description: Remove history entries for a domain from a selected browser

name: Cookie Cleaner
description: Delete unwanted cookies using a whitelist approach

name: Lowercase Renamer
description: Rename all files in a folder to lowercase

description: Match file names between two folders while keeping extensions

name: Folder Compare
description: List file name differences between two folders

name: Base64 PDF to PNG
description: Decode a Base64 PDF/image and export PNG(s)

description: Generate ComfyUI prompts using KoboldCpp or local GGUF models

name: Hunyuan3D 2.1 Manager
description: Clone, update, and run the Tencent Hunyuan3D 2.1 toolkit with a rich command builder

name: Lyrics Embedder Manager
description: Embed lyrics into audio tags with provider fallbacks and optional AI metadata recovery.

name: CSV Editor
description: Import CSV files with delimiter detection and export with custom formatting options.
